title: Respond to Real-time Production Alert
description: An operator receives a real-time alert from a CNC machine indicating a tool is nearing its wear limit.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the alert and retrieve the specific tool's usage data.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent acknowledges the SCADA alert and views the tool's current operational hours.

tasks.description: Check the production schedule to find the next available window for a tool change.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a scheduled changeover or break within the next few hours.

tasks.description: Schedule a maintenance task for the tool change and notify the maintenance team.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a maintenance ticket and assigns it to the appropriate team.
